headline.main: C.I.O. GROUPS HERE TO BACK WAR ENTRY; Delegates to Convention Will Fight Supporters of Lewis Opposing Participation

lead_paragraph: New York representatives at the national convention of the Congress of Industrial Organizations, to open in Detroit on Nov. 17, will fight against any effort by supporters of John L. Lewis to have the convention go on record as opposed to American participation in the European war, leaders of the C.I.O. said yesterday.
abstract: left and right wing CIO groups in N Y area back defense effort

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: INDUSTRIAL UNION COUNCIL, GREATER N Y
